Description: Fragment of belly of black-figure painted pottery neck-amphora. Part of handle ornament; palmette.
Curator's comments: Compare with the handle ornament on the neck-amphora of the Amasis Painter (Boston , Museum of Fine Arts 01.8027) and the neck-amphora of the Madrid Painter.
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 608, 19)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 65)
